thread.title: WATCH: Bees swarm infield during Rockies-Padres preseason game
thread.title_full: WATCH: Bees swarm infield during Rockies-Padres preseason game

author: Joe Nguyen
title: WATCH: Bees swarm infield during Rockies-Padres preseason game
text: “It’s a different world now,” Dick Monfort says, after Rockies extend Coors Field lease long-term March 30, 2017, 7:18 pm The four-year ordeal to keep baseball at Coors Field for three more decades proved to be a new experience for Rockies owner Dick Monfort. On Wednesday, he agreed to extend his club’s lease at the ballpark through 2047. But not without difficulty. Rockies’ confidence in their young catchers kept them from chasing free agents March 30, 2017, 5:41 pm With spring training in its last gasps, the Rockies stopped to look around this week. Their season-opening pitching rotation probably will be the youngest in the 25-year history of the franchise. And the entire battery will be young. So the Rockies wondered out loud whether now is the time to find a veteran catcher. Kiszla: Does Jon Gray have stuff to break Rockies’ opening-day starter curse? March 30, 2017, 5:31 pm He might not be stuck with the most mind-freaking job in sports, but Rockies pitcher Jon Gray is definitely on the shortlist. Trevor Story’s spectacular play highlights Rockies’ win over Padres March 30, 2017, 5:23 pm Trevor Story’s dive-‘n-roll stole the show Thursday afternoon in the Rockies’ 10-5 victory over San Diego.
